name: Mint Lemonade
history: Mint Lemonade is a refreshing drink popular worldwide, particularly in hot climates. Its origins are believed to be from the Middle East. The combination of lemon and mint offers a perfect balance of tartness and a cool, refreshing taste.
description: Mint Lemonade is a vibrant and refreshing drink made by blending fresh mint leaves with lemon juice, sugar, and water. It's known for its invigorating flavor and is often served chilled as a perfect antidote to hot weather.

instructions.title: Blend Ingredients
instructions.description: In a blender, combine mint leaves, lemon juice, sugar, and a little water. Blend until the mint is finely chopped.

instructions.title: Add Water and Ice
instructions.description: Add the remaining cold water and some ice cubes to the blender. Blend until smooth.

instructions.title: Garnish and Serve
instructions.description: Pour the lemonade into glasses. Garnish with additional lemon slices and mint leaves.

tips: Adjust the amount of sugar according to your taste.
Use fresh mint leaves for the best flavor.
variations: Add sparkling water for a fizzy variation.
Mix with iced tea to make a mint lemon tea.

storage.shelfLife: Best consumed immediately. Can be refrigerated for up to 24 hours.
storage.instructions: Store in a sealed container in the refrigerator.

presentationTips: Serve in tall glasses with a decorative straw.
Garnish with a sprig of mint or a twist of lemon peel for an elegant touch.
